channel.title: Help ...pi...mysql?
channel.description: i have got a popular server running atm and i wana add vote for cash high scores etc and know how to do said things the only problem i have is my dedi company wont let me use mysql from there host address is there away i can host it elsewhere and somehow connect to the server from say host100 or something ? any help will be appreciated... ;D
